name: Yilong Li
body:
# YILONG LI (李一龙) School of EECS, Peking University ### Research Interests - Computer Vision and Robotics - High-Performance Computing ### Educational Background - 2013.09 – Present, Undergraduate,
School of Electronics Engineering and Computer Science, Peking University - Bachelor of Science in Computer Science, Expected July, 2017. - Overall GPA: 3.72/4.0, Major GPA: 3.71/4.0 - Ranking: Top 15 / 198 ### Awards - 2016.11, Merit Student Award & Okamatsu Scholarship, Peking University, - 2015.11, Merit Student Award & Founder Scholarship, Peking University, - 2014.11, National Scholarship, Ministry of Education, - 2016.05, Third Prize, “SURPASS Cup” Programming Contest in Peking University. - 2014.05, Third Prize, “Schlumberger Cup” Programming Contest in Peking University. ### Research Experience - 2015.03 -- Present, Research Assistant,
Center for Energy-Efficient Computing and Applications(CECA), Peking University - Advisor: Yun (Eric) Liang - Project PanoStitch: Improve the stitched image quality for real-time video panoramic image stitching, intended to be used on a vehicle parking assistance system, with Xuewei Zhang and Lei Yang. - Project iRobot: track and follow specific people using an Asus Xtion Pro Live depth-sensing camera, and an iRobot Create, a two-wheeled programmable robot. - 2016.02 -- Present, Team Leader,
Student Cluster Competition Team of Peking University - Preparing for SC16 Student Cluster Competition in Salt Lake City, Utah in November, 2016 - In charge of system administration and benchmarking of the cluster. - 2016.07 -- 2016.08, Research Visitor,
School of Informatics, the University of Edinburgh - Supervisor: Dr. J. Michael Herrmann - Researching Focus: Self-organization of robot behavior ### Extracurricular Activities - 2016.09 -- 2017.01, Teaching Assistant for Introduction to Computer Systems, Prof. Junlin Lu, Prof. Xiangqun Chen, et al. - 2016.02 -- 2016.07, Teaching Assistant for Algorithm Design and Analysis, Prof. Wanling Qu, Prof. Tingting Jiang, et al. - 2015.06 -- 2016.06, Director-General, The Original Fire Anime and Comics Association of Peking University - 2013.09 -- Present, Class President, Class 7, Grade 2013, School of EECS. ### Skills - Programming Languages - C/C++, Python, Bash scripting, Java, JavaScript, PHP. - Parallel Programming - OpenMP, MPI, NVIDIA CUDA - Robotics Programming using ROS as a middleware - English - College English Test: Band 4: 647/710, Band 6: 654 / 710 - TOEFL: Reading 29/30, Listening 29/30, Speaking 20/30, Writing 30/30 - GRE General Test: Verbal 169/170, Quantitive 167/170
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
